content: The Skeptical User: This archetype represents users who have concerns about the trustworthiness or security of the Cita Previa website at first glance. They may fear that the website is a scam or that their personal information is at risk. These users may need additional reassurance or evidence of its reliability before they are willing to proceed with the booking process. This archetype could include older users who may be more cautious about sharing personal information online, as well as foreigners who may not be familiar with the website or the process of booking appointments in Spain. It could also include tech-savvy users who may have high expectations for the security and privacy of online services.
